actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Border and Maritime Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Border and Maritime Security

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to authorize use of port security grant funds for replacement of certain security equipment or facilities.
short_title: Port Security Equipment Improvement Act of 2012

summary.text: Port Security Equipment Improvement Act of 2012 - Authorizes the use of port security grant program funds for the cost of replacing security equipment or facilities that correct Coast Guard-identified vulnerabilities in port security and ensure compliance with Area Maritime Transportation Security Plans and facility security plans.

titles.title: Port Security Equipment Improvement Act of 2012
To amend title 46, United States Code, to authorize use of port security grant funds for replacement of certain security equipment or facilities.
